import React from"react";import"./style.css";import defaultProfileImage from"assets/image/default-profile-image.png";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{BOARD_DETAIL_PATH}from"constant";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";// component: Top 3 List Item 컴포넌트 //
